name: react-component-multi-select
description: An accessible multi select component for React 16

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production webpack src/react-multi-select.js dist/react-multi-select.js && NODE_ENV=production webpack src/react-multi-select.js dist/react-multi-select.min.js --optimize-minimize

author: Sergey Kurdin and Brent Burgoyne
